college.name: Malmö University
recognitions: Ranked among top 300 universities under 50 years old (THE 2024)

organizers.name: Student Council
organizers.role: Coordinates student governance and cross-campus events

organizers.name: Technical Club
organizers.description: Promotes technical learning through workshops, competitions, and innovation challenges.

organizers.name: Cultural Committee
organizers.role: Manages arts, music, theatre, and cultural events including Verdi's Requiem

organizers.name: Sports Board
organizers.role: Organizes athletics, competitions, and wellness initiatives

organizers.name: Alumni & Friends Network
organizers.role: Connects graduates with current students and the university community

technical.name: TechFest
technical.description: Annual technical festival showcasing student projects and innovations.

technical.name: Hackathon
technical.description: 24-hour coding competition to solve real-world problems.

cultural.name: Annual Day
cultural.description: Celebration of student talent in arts, music, and drama.

cultural.name: Music Nights
cultural.description: Monthly informal concerts featuring student bands and performers.

sports_other.name: Inter-college Sports Meet
sports_other.description: Competitive sports event against other colleges.

sports_other.name: Alumni Meet
sports_other.description: Annual gathering of graduates to network and share experiences.

strategy.vision: Contribute to a sustainable and just society through research-based knowledge, critical thinking, and readiness for action.
Contribute to a sustainable and just society through research-based knowledge, critical thinking, and readiness for action.

alumni.purpose: Keep lifelong ties, support students, and foster professional development
network_features: Alumni & Friends newsletter (4 times per year)
Opportunities to mentor students or speak at campus events

contacts.notes: Switchboard open weekdays 8–16; hours may vary in summer/public holidays

events.title: Annual Academic Celebration and Ceremony 2025
events.description: Week-long celebration of academic achievements with public events, new professor appointments, and keynote lectures.

events.title: The 2nd Annual Organisation Studies Symposium
events.description: Faculty of Culture and Society conference featuring keynote speakers and paper presentations on critical organisation studies.

events.title: The Nordic Police Research Seminar
events.description: Research seminar exploring policing, justice, and societal security across the Nordic region.

events.title: BRCB — The Annual Workshop at Biofilms Research Centre
events.description: 20th annual workshop focused on water research, biofilm dynamics, and biointerfaces.

events.title: Migration seminar: Children and youth empowerment through sports
events.description: Participatory Action Research with sport-for-development initiatives in Sweden and Uganda.

events.title: PhD Summer School: Building theory in STEM education research
events.description: International PhD course to develop theoretical framing and methodology in science and technology education.

events.title: 3rd Malmö Work Science Meeting
events.description: Sessions on Gender and Power, Leadership and Organisation, Care and Conflict.

events.title: Verdi's Requiem
events.description: Malmö Academic Choir and Orchestra with partner choirs performing this monumental choral work.

events.title: Europe Day 2025
events.description: Faculty of Culture and Society event celebrating European unity and values.

events.title: Doctoral School: Sustainable Movement Education
events.description: Interdisciplinary doctoral program focusing on physical activity, health, and societal change.

events.title: Citizen Health Research Seminar
events.description: Public seminar on participatory health research and community engagement.
